Perceptor:

"Take this SCUM!!!!"said while he shots 25 times against Darkangel


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Darkangel : :
> 
> Darkangel aligns himself for a shot from the air and releases four 
plasma charges at Maxima.
> 
> : : Wolfenstein : :
> 
> Wolfenstein leaped in wolf mode, attemting to tackle Tyrael before 
he could harm Hydras.
> 
> Wolfenstein: You havn't shown your worthyness to fight the 
commander, you'll deal with me.
> 
> 
> Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Tyrael grinned grimly.
> 
> Tyrael: Today is your last day, renegades...
> 
> Dreadplague took flight, transforming to her menacing wyvern mode. 
Her
> black scaly body was like a bad omen for the defenders. She turned 
her
> head and saw Perceptor... Pathetic fool, she thought. Then, she
> focused her mind on him and stirred up all the fears he had deep 
down,
> but mostly the feeling of despair that comes before death.
> 
> She closed in and readied her talons...
> 
> Tyrael, though, shot once at Maxima then went for Hydras at a 
stunning
> speed. He did not seem like it, but he matched his enemy on all
> points. He intended for Hydras to know he was out for him.
>

but

no

situation.

wicked

cover.
